Author: Throwaway_For_Thot
Text: Thank you, I really needed to hear this ❤️ you’re a kind soul

Author: chloesmiddlefinger
Text: I'm really sorry to hear you're struggling, but I just want you to know that this stranger is proud of you for graduating - that's a huge accomplishment, and I sincerely hope you'll be able to celebrate this major achievement. I can promise you that, no matter what you end up wearing, you won't look like a "fat tub of lard" - you'll look like someone whose very existence is worth celebrating.
